hall-of-fame.no-results: No results for this challenge yet...

loading.text: Please wait while challenge is loaded...

globe-initialization-error.title: Error
globe-initialization-error.text: 3D globe initialization error has occurred. Please be sure that you use a modern web browser with WebGL support and you have a modern graphics card (dedicated graphics cards such as NVIDIA are preferred).

globe-rendering-error.title: Error
globe-rendering-error.text: 3D globe rendering error has occurred.. Please contact delevopers to resolve the issue.

audio.title: Audio notification
audio.text: Please note that interacting with a page you allow it play sounds. If you don't want sounds to be played consider disabling them in game settings.

about.title: About
about.text: This game is developed under the impression from Classical Conversions and is dedicated to learning the geography by whole our family.

mobile-unsupported.title: Attention!
mobile-unsupported.text: Unfortunatelly, mobile devices are unsupported at the moment. If you are interested in supporting mobile devices, please contact developers.
